description: Extract structured data from web pages using AgentQL queries.

url.info: The URL of the web page to extract data from.

query.info: Natural language query describing the data you want to extract from the page.

api_key.info: AgentQL API key for authentication (optional, can be set via environment variable).

mode.info: Query execution mode: 'standard' for accuracy, 'fast' for speed.

is_scroll_to_bottom.info: Automatically scroll to the bottom of the page before extracting data.

wait_for_page.info: Time to wait for the page to load before extracting data (in milliseconds).

is_return_markdown.info: Include the page content in markdown format in the response.

warnings.no_data_extracted: No data was extracted from the page
warnings.response_conversion_failed: Failed to convert response to dictionary: {error}

errors.agentql_not_installed: AgentQL is not installed. Please install it using: pip install agentql
